name: Rebirth (Demo)
description:
REBIRTH (Demo Version)

Explore a forgotten canyon buried in the deserts of the future. This project was inspired by old-school point and click adventure games like Myst, to see if such an experience was possible inside of Game Maker Studio. 

This is the demo version, and is rather short, but I hope you'll find your time exploring the little world enjoyable. If you'd like to see more of this game or others like it, please feel free to send me feedback or just say hi. 

I can be reached at valerie.paris24@gmail.com or on Twitter @UncannyVallerie
